AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically (yes = active, no = deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be downloaded automatically and sent to you (yes = active, no = deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_READ.description: Your contact messages will be read automatically (yes = active, no = deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_REACT.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto react

ANTICALL.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto reject calls

AUTO_REACT_STATUS.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto like status

PM_PERMIT.description: Other users can't use your bot in pm (yes = active, no = deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

BOT_NAME.description: Put a name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: Add one or many links for your bot menu ; eg : url1,url2,url3.....

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Type yes to put your bot on public mode or no to put it on private mode

SESSION_ID.description: Put your session ID , the code you receive after scanning Qr code

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Your number , don't put '+' and put your area code (example of Tanzania üáπüáø: 255772341432)

WARN_COUNT.description: This is the limit of warnings for warning commands

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: If you don't want starting-bot-message put no else put yes

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 online. 2 typing a message. 3 recording . Or leave the field blank to indicate your real state.

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: If you want to enable anti delete message put yes else put no

CHATBOT.description: Turn on the chatbot reply system (yes = active, no = deactive)

AUTO_BIO.description: Enable auto bio response in auto bio (yes = active, no = deactive)
